value.title: Diving into Deep Learning
value.excerpt: It’s deep learning, which represents a step-jump from the previous generations of AI. But what exactly is deep learning? Deep Learning is the popular name for a branch of machine learning techniques called Artificial Neural Networks (neural nets).

value.title: Simon Says AI Tool Turns Text Transcript Into Video-Editing Platform
value.excerpt: Video creators can now use a browser-based text editing program called Simon Says Assemble to assemble rough cuts of video pieces. Simon Says is building on its AI-based transcription tools to enable the text-based video assemblies.

value.title: Christopher Nolan Trashes HBO Max, Gets Trashed By Twitter In Response
value.excerpt: HBO Max, have finally come together - to make fun of While many filmmakers are (understandably) unhappy with the fact that their films are going to hit theatres and HBO Max simultaneously, Nolan had an amusingly dismissive take,

value.title: Microsoft launches Azure Digital Twins in general availability
value.excerpt: Microsoft's Azure Digital Twins service, which launched in preivew in November 2018, is now generally available.

value.title: Baidu Apollo gets green light for fully driverless road tests in Beijing
value.excerpt: AutoX announced the roll out a fleet of autonomous RoboTaxis in downtown Shenzhen, representing the first time such vehicles have been deployed in China without safety drivers or remote operators.

value.title: Google Cloud expands edge computing to help companies leverage AI and 5G
value.excerpt: Google Cloud expands its edge computing services by partnering with 200 developers to put their applications closer to enterprise customers.

value.title: Google’s Look to Speak taps gaze-tracking AI to help users with impairments communicate
value.excerpt: Google released an Android app called Look to Speak that enables users to select prewritten phrases to communicate using only their gaze.

value.title: Machine Learning Identifies Brain Signature of Depression
value.excerpt: Using machine learning, researchers have identified novel, distinct patterns of coordinated activity between brain regions in people with major depressive disorder – even when different protocols are used to detect these brain networks.

value.title: Tech Startup AiFi Debuts Largest Hybrid Unmanned Store In Shanghai
value.excerpt: California-based tech start-up AiFi has just debuted its fourth and largest autonomous store in Shanghai. Founded by Steve Gu and Ying Zheng, the company specializes in autonomous computer-vision technologies applied into stores of all scales and sizes,

value.title: DoorDash IPO — How to get a job in consulting — AI in accounting
value.excerpt: The top finance stories for December 8, including the latest news on how to get a job at FTI Consulting.

value.title: Iranian nuclear scientist allegedly assassinated via killer robot
value.excerpt: A top nuclear scientist with the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC), a branch of Iran’s military services, was assassinated on 27 November in what the Iranian government is calling an assassination via AI-powered machine gun.

value.title: BMW develops AI-powered big data hub with AWS to boost manufacturing efficiency
value.excerpt: BMW has developed a data hub with Amazon’s cloud computing division, in a sign of how companies are using “big data” to boost efficiency.

value.title: AWS Announces Plans to Open Second Region in Australia
value.excerpt: Amazon Web Services, Inc. (AWS), an Amazon.com company (NASDAQ: AMZN), today announced plans to open a second infrastructure region in Australia in

value.title: The Aftermath Of COVID-19: Future Of Logistics Reimagined With AI
value.excerpt: With the waves of disruption slowly settling, logistics firms are now actively on the hunt for creative ways to optimize their operations

value.title: Europe’s funding for deep tech like AI and VR fell 13% in 2020
value.excerpt: As European startups have tried to carve out a competitive edge against the U.S. and China, there has been a big push to promote so-called “deep tech.” And in recent years, there had indeed been a surge in European startups that were developing products based on scientific breakthroughs.

value.title: How AWS aims to democratize machine learning with cloud services
value.excerpt: Swami Sivasubramanian, vice president of Amazon AI, will hold the first-ever re:Invent keynote on the topic, a clear sign that AWS views AI and machine learning as an area ripe for reinvention. AWS Chief Executive Andy Jassy (pictured) told me that the company’s overall aim is to enable machine learning to be embedded into most applications before the decade is out by making it accessible to more than just experts.

value.title: Augury, the Israeli AI start-up that detects factory errors ahead of time
value.excerpt: Augury, an Israeli industrial Internet of Things (IIot) company, a leading AI-based Machine Health solution provider, developed sensors and smart devices that monitor machine activity, then upload to the cloud all the information collected about that machine activity that is finally analyzed by an algorithm.

value.title: Japan to invest in AI matchmaking to boost plummeting birth rates
value.excerpt: The Japanese government will invest in artificial intelligence (AI) to bring single citizens together -- and, perhaps, help stabilize falling birth rates.  As reported by the Japan Times, the Cabinet Office intends to allocate ¥2 billion ($19 million) to local authorities that run dating programs for residents.

value.title: Breeding neuromorphic networks for fun and profit: The new reproductive science
value.excerpt: The most expedient way to produce the algorithms you need for a new class of computer that works like the brain, its engineers are discovering, is through a Darwinian exercise in natural selection.

value.title: $50K AI Prediction Contest Launches Today
value.excerpt: A forecasting platform that aggregates insight from thousands of technology experts announced a two-year contest today focused on AI predictions: the future state of key benchmarks in machine learning,

value.title: Uber sells self-driving unit Uber ATG in deal that will push Aurora’s valuation to $10B
value.excerpt: Aurora Innovation, the autonomous vehicle startup backed by Sequoia Capital and Amazon, has reached an agreement with Uber to buy the ride-hailing firm’s self-driving unit in a complex deal that will value the combined company at $10 billion.

value.title: Brainchip leads the ASX’s top small cap AI stocks in 2020
value.excerpt: If you’re an investor seeking exposure to AI in the small cap space look no further because we have compiled an extensive run-down of small cap ASX stocks.

value.title: AWS Expands Think Big, ATO, AI/ML Rapid Adoption Programs
value.excerpt: Amazon Web Services is ramping up offerings for its public sector partners with the expansion of its Think Big for Small Business, AI/ML Rapid Adoption and Authority to Operate on AWS programs

value.title: Spectrm’s conversational marketing platform unlocks revenue
